Text: We need a holocaust to get rid of people like ramikaz.

No, we need to EDUCATE you, DarthPs3. You believe all this propaganda bullshit? Year after year at least 4-5 movies about the evil nazis/holocaust come out. Why? Why not about WW1? What about all the other wars? Jews run Hollywood. That's why. (I'm NOT jealous/hating), just stating facts.
